chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Rosara Medrano, p. 94 (99)—Aes Sedai native to Tear. She wears carved ivory combs in her black hair. She is tall, and as tan as the Aiel. She arrived at the inn Samitsu is staying at in Cairhien to inform her that Logain had arrived in the city.
